These people are
building something great.

Startup Shell is a student-run coworking space and incubator at the University of Maryland. We foster entrepreneurship through collaboration.

Apply for Membership Learn More

A Community of Entrepreneurs

Designed to Catalyze Growth

Startup Shell was founded out of a storage closet in 2012 with the mission of creating an entrepreneurship community for students at the University of Maryland.

200+ founders
60+ ventures
$30M total value
See All Ventures
